title: Create Quarterly Business Review (QBR) Deck
description: An analyst needs to prepare a slide deck for a QBR meeting, summarizing the last quarter's marketing performance.

tasks.description: Pull performance data for the entire last quarter across all major channels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary data for the 3-month period.

tasks.description: Populate a standard QBR slide template with the data, including charts for key trends.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent fills out the slide deck with accurate data and visualizations.

tasks.description: Write a summary of key achievements, challenges, and learnings from the quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds insightful, narrative context to the data.
